actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the alternative motor vehicle credit for 10 years, and for other purposes.
subjects: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text: Energy Efficient Vehicles Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2018 the tax credit for alternative motor vehicles. Repeals the limitation on the number of new qualified hybrid and advanced lean-burn technology vehicles eligible for such credit.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the alternative motor vehicle credit for 10 years, and for other purposes.
